HOT ISSUE

Introduction

Yewon is a South Korean trainee, best known for her time as a member of HOT ISSUE, a girl group under S2 Entertainment, and for her appearance on the reality show Universe Ticket. She made her debut with HOT ISSUE on April 28, 2021, with the mini album "Issue Maker".

However, after a 4-month period of no updates, S2 Entertainment announced on April 22, 2022, that HOT ISSUE would officially disband, just six days before their first anniversary. This decision came after extensive discussions about the group's future and direction.

In 2023, Yewon joined Universe Ticket, though she was unfortunately eliminated in the sixth episode.
